Description: On I-81 at mile marker 34.8 in the County of Smyth, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 134.2 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
